content: if you love learning new stitches and techniques what better way to practice than making a dishcloth that you can use or gift to a loved one in this pattern you ll learn to crochet the simple texture dishcloth using the alternating spike stitch - a combination of single crochets and spike stitches this stitch is thick dense and absorbent making it perfect for dishcloths > the free pattern for the simple texture dishcloth can be found ** here 1 ** skill level beginner language english crochet terminology us terms crochet stitch chain slip_stitch single_crochet spike stitch sizes this dishcloth measures approximately 6 5 x 6 25 instructions are also provided to customize the size of your dishcloth materials * 4 0mm and 5 0mm crochet hook * 2 stitch markers or safety pins * any medium 4 worsted weight 100% cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle yardage * 55 yds / 50 m > yarn note 100% cotton is recommended because it is absorbent and easy to care for however you can use any yarn fiber to make dishcloths if you are using acrylic and/or wool the yarn is thicker so you may have to follow the customization instructions included in the pattern to make it the right size i hope you enjoy making and using your dishcloths 1 https //thispixiecreates com/simple-textured-crochet-dishcloth/
